metadata.title: CVE-2008-5155 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: mail2sms.sh in smsclient 2.0.8z allows local users to overwrite arbitraryfiles via a symlink attack on a (1) /tmp/header.##### or (2)/tmp/body.##### temporary file, or append data to arbitrary files via asymlink attack on the (3) /tmp/sms.log temporary file.

criterions.comment: smsclient: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
